MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH19 postcode area of Bonnyrigg. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am for safety due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35am on Friday, 23 April 2021
